description: This file defines a SlackTools class that provides methods to interact with Slack via the slack_sdk, including sending messages, listing channels, and fetching channel history. It extends a Toolkit class and uses environment variables and external Slack SDK components.

classes.name: SlackTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Slack, providing methods for messaging, listing channels, and retrieving channel history.

methods.name: send_message
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified Slack channel and returns the API response as a JSON string.

methods.name: send_message_thread
methods.description: Sends a threaded message to a Slack channel and returns the API response as a JSON string.

methods.name: list_channels
methods.description: Lists all channels in the Slack workspace and returns the list as a JSON string.

methods.name: get_channel_history
methods.description: Retrieves message history from a Slack channel and returns it as a JSON string.
